statements: SELECT * FROM StudentsBehavioralData;
SELECT student_name, behavior_date, behavior_description FROM StudentsBehavioralData;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_type='Positive';
SELECT * FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, behavior_description FROM StudentsBehavioralData ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_type = 'positive' ORDER BY behavior_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_date FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_type = 'negative' AND behavior_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, behavior_type FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND behavior_description LIKE '%late%' ORDER BY student_name, behavior_date;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT student_name) AS total_students, MAX(behavior_date) AS latest_behavior_date FROM StudentsBehavioralData WHERE behavior_type = 'positive';
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM StudentsBehavioralData GROUP BY behavior_type ORDER BY behavior_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data ORDER BY observation_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, behavior_type FROM behavior_data WHERE student_id = 1234;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY observation_date;
SELECT intervention_id, student_id, intervention_type FROM intervention_data WHERE intervention_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, observation_date FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_description LIKE '%late%' ORDER BY observation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM behavior_data WHERE student_id = 1 ORDER BY observation_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, observation_date FROM behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive' AND observation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM behavior_data WHERE observation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY observation_date;
SELECT behavior_type, COUNT(*) AS behavior_count FROM behavior_data GROUP BY behavior_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT b.student_id, i.intervention_type, i.intervention_date FROM behavior_data b INNER JOIN intervention_data i ON b.student_id = i.student_id WHERE b.behavior_type = 'Negative' AND i.intervention_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudentBehaviorData;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM StudentBehaviorData WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT intervention_description FROM Interventions WHERE intervention_type = 'Positive';
SELECT pattern_name FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_id > 2;
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, behavior_description FROM StudentBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT behavior_type, behavior_description FROM StudentBehaviorData ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM StudentBehaviorData WHERE behavior_type = 'Violent' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp ASC;

SELECT intervention_description, intervention_type FROM Interventions JOIN StudentBehaviorData ON Interventions.student_id = StudentBehaviorData.student_id WHERE StudentBehaviorData.behavior_type = 'Disruptive' ORDER BY intervention_timestamp DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_description FROM Patterns WHERE pattern_description LIKE '%behavior%' ORDER BY pattern_id ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT * FROM StudentBehaviorData JOIN Interventions ON StudentBehaviorData.student_id = Interventions.student_id JOIN Patterns ON StudentBehaviorData.student_id = Patterns.pattern_id ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC, intervention_timestamp ASC, pattern_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM students_data
SELECT student_name, behavior_type FROM students_data
SELECT student_id, behavior_date FROM students_data ORDER BY behavior_date DESC
SELECT behavior_description FROM behaviors WHERE behavior_category = 'Positive'

SELECT student_name, intervention_description, intervention_date FROM students_data INNER JOIN student_interventions ON students_data.student_id = student_intervations.student_id INNER JOIN interventions ON student_interventions.intervention_id = interventions.intervention_id
SELECT student_name, behavior_type FROM students_data WHERE behavior_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT behavior_category, behavior_description FROM behaviors ORDER BY behavior_category ASC
SELECT * FROM interventions WHERE intervention_date BETWEEN '2022-03-01' AND '2022-03-31'

SELECT student_name, intervention_description, intervention_date FROM students_data JOIN student_interventions ON students_data.student_id = student_interventions.student_id JOIN interventions ON student_interventions.intervention_id = interventions.intervention_id

SELECT student_name, behavior_type, intervention_description FROM students_data JOIN student_interventions ON students_data.student_id = student_interventions.student_id JOIN interventions ON student_interventions.intervention_id = interventions.intervention_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive'
SELECT * FROM StudentDetails;
SELECT student_name, age FROM StudentDetails WHERE age > 10;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM StudentDetails ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM BehaviorRecords WHERE behavior_type = 'Positive' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;
SELECT parent_name, contact_date, contact_description FROM ParentContacts WHERE contact_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM StudentDetails WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM StudentDetails WHERE primary_disability = 'Autism' ORDER BY student_name ASC;

SELECT student_name, behavior_type, behavior_timestamp FROM StudentDetails JOIN BehaviorRecords ON StudentDetails.student_id = BehaviorRecords.student_id WHERE behavior_type = 'Negative' ORDER BY behavior_timestamp DESC;

SELECT student_name, intervention_type, intervention_details FROM StudentDetails JOIN InterventionLog ON StudentDetails.student_id = InterventionLog.student_id WHERE intervention_type = 'Therapy' ORDER BY student_name ASC, intervention_timestamp ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_reports, student_name FROM StudentDetails JOIN ProgressReports ON StudentDetails.student_id = ProgressReports.student_id GROUP BY student_name ORDER BY num_reports DESC;
